tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (DT That) (NN moment) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBP post) (NP (NP (DT an) (NN opening)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP$ your) (NN dream) (NN job)))))) (, ,) (CC but) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP do) (RB n't) (VP (VB have) (NP (DT the) (JJ relevant) (NN experience) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB get) (NP (PRP it))))))))))) (. .)))
